description.value:
Requirements Your last action this round was a successful Strike against a target you were @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Hidden] from or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Undetected] by.

You throw an object, activate a hidden flare, or take some other action while your target is still disoriented from your attack. Attempt a @Check[deception|against:will] check against the Will DC of the target of your last Strike; on a success, you're hidden from the target or undetected on a critical success.
